CustomField.description: Identifies the maximum quantity of Packaged Items that can be selected when selecting this Item or Items from this Item Class. Defaults 0. The value of 0 is infinite.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the maximum quantity of Packaged Items that can be selected when selecting this Item or Items from this Item Class. Defaults 0. The value of 0 is infinite.
CustomField.label: Maximum Quantity
